item.title: 南非统计局局长为失业数据计算辩护
item.description: 南非统计机构负责人为该机构的失业数据方法进行了辩护，因为南非最大客户银行的负责人称，对交易员的错误分类意味着失业率要低得多。【原文：The head of South Africa’s statistics agency defended the methodology of his organization’s unemployment data after the chief of the nation’s top bank by customers said misclassification of traders means the jobless rate was much lower.】

item.title: 欧盟希望美国贸易谈判能超过特朗普的七月最后期限
item.description: 欧盟认为，与美国的贸易谈判可能会超过美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）规定的 7 月 9 日这一最后期限，尽管谈判的速度在过去一周有所加快。【原文：The European Union believes trade negotiations with the US could extend beyond President Donald Trump’s July 9 deadline, even as the speed of the talks has increased over the past week.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀率再次上升，中央银行面临挑战
item.description: 匈牙利 5 月份通胀率三个月来首次加速上升，凸显出央行行长们在使消费价格增长回归目标方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Hungarian inflation accelerated in May for the first time in three months, underscoring central bankers’ challenge in returning consumer price growth toward their target.】

item.title: 瑞典对加入欧元的支持减弱，克朗走强
item.description: 一项调查显示，在近期克朗走强之后，瑞典人采用欧元的热情出现了四年半来的首次下降。【原文：Swedes’ enthusiasm to adopt the euro fell for the first time in four and a half years after a recent run of strength for the krona, a survey showed.】

item.title: 中国稀土永磁制造商为出口美国开绿灯
item.description: 中国一家主要的稀土磁铁制造商获得了向包括美国在内的国家出口的许可，这可能是北京与华盛顿之间紧张局势缓和的一个迹象。【原文：A major Chinese manufacturer of rare-earth magnets received export permits to countries including the US, in a possible sign of easing tensions between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市错失创纪录高点后将下滑
据说保诚印度资产管理公司即将提交首次公开募股申请
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英国保诚集团（Prudential Plc）在印度的资产管理合资企业即将向当地监管机构提交首次公开募股的初步文件，募集资金可能高达 1,000 亿卢比（约合 12 亿美元）。【原文：Prudential Plc’s Indian asset-management venture is close to filing preliminary documents with the local regulator for a proposed initial public offering that may fetch as much as 100 billion rupees ($1.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开设特朗普账户永远不嫌早
item.description:
为孩子们设立 1000 美元的投资基金，在他们年满 18 岁之前不得动用，是一个值得考虑的想法。【原文：

A $1,000 investment fund for kids, untouchable until they reach 18, is a worthy idea.

】

item.title: Proxima Fusion 筹集 1.3 亿欧元，成为欧洲核电冠军
item.description:
公司将利用这笔资金开发作为该技术关键组成部分的超导磁体。【原文：

The company will use the funds to develop superconducting magnets that are a key component of the technology.

】

item.title: 路虎、房子和威士忌：黄金拉力赛为津巴布韦农村带来财富
item.description:
金价飙升推动非洲小规模生产蓬勃发展 

Surge in gold prices is driving a boom in Africa’s small-scale production 

】

item.title: 新加坡支持的房地产公司押注印度娱乐业蓬勃发展
item.description: Prestige Estates Projects Ltd. 是印度市值排名前五位的房地产开发商之一，该公司的一位高级官员表示，该公司正寻求在商场中出售更多的娱乐和餐饮空间，同时减少服装零售商。【原文：Prestige Estates Projects Ltd., which ranks among India’s top five real estate developers by market value, is looking to sell more entertainment and dining spaces in malls while cutting back on apparel retailers, a top official said.】

item.title: 贝恩和 KKR 被认为是札幌公司的第二轮竞标者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）、KKR & Co.和Lone Star等投资公司已进入第二轮竞购札幌控股公司（Sapporo Holdings Ltd.）房地产部门的阶段。【原文：Bain Capital, KKR & Co. and Lone Star are among investment firms that have advanced to the second round of bidding for the real estate unit of Sapporo Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Alphabet的人工智能批评者问错了问题
item.description:
近期的股东提案表明，技术和人工智能治理确实存在不足。【原文：

Recent shareholder proposals show how inadequate tech and AI governance really is.

】

item.title: 欧元难以战胜捷克人对采用欧元的缓慢态度
item.description: 捷克央行行长赞扬了捷克货币的好处，称与欧元相比，捷克克朗使其更有能力缓和物价增长。【原文：The Czech central bank governor touted the benefits of his country’s currency, saying that the koruna puts it in a better position to moderate price-growth than the euro would.】

item.title: 朝鲜似乎扩建了核设施
item.description: 卫星图像显示，朝鲜似乎在其主要核设施内建造了一座新建筑，这可能是一个额外的浓缩设施，以提高该国生产核武器的能力。【原文：North Korea appears to have constructed a new building within its main nuclear complex, satellite imagery showed, in what could be an additional enrichment facility to ramp up the country’s ability to produce nuclear weapons.】

item.title: 香港禁止电子游戏，进一步加强国家安全
item.description: 香港首次援引国家安全法禁止一款视频游戏，扩大了使用这套法律来抵御感知到的威胁的范围，并要求互联网服务提供商遵守。【原文：Hong Kong invoked national security laws to ban a video game for the first time, broadening the use of the set of legislation to fend off perceived threats and requiring internet service providers to comply.】

item.title: 生物技术公司 MediLink 据称将为香港 IPO 聘请银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，MediLink Therapeutics Ltd.已聘请中国国际金融有限公司、摩根大通和摩根士丹利为其在香港的首次公开募股计划提供服务。【原文：MediLink Therapeutics Ltd. has hired China International Capital Corp., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Morgan Stanley for a planned initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国家庭贷款攀升，加剧韩国央行和监管机构的担忧
item.description: 韩国银行对家庭的贷款攀升至九个月来的最高点，这一增长加剧了央行和金融监管机构对债务不断增加的担忧，因为决策者们正在评估应给予萎靡不振的经济多大支持。【原文：South Korea’s bank lending to households climbed the most in nine months, an increase that adds to concerns over growing debt at the central bank and the financial regulator as policymakers assess how much support to give the sputtering economy.】

item.title: 中国度假胜地海南为本季首个台风做好准备
item.description: 海南岛正在为本季西太平洋的第一个台风做好准备，预计当该系统靠近海岸时，中国南部部分地区将遭受暴雨袭击。【原文：Hainan Island is bracing for the first typhoon of the season in the western Pacific, with the storm expected to dump heavy rain across parts of southern China as the system nears the coast.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称日本长期债务对外国人有吸引力
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示，外国投资者正在关注日本的长期债券，而日本政府何时调整出售债券的数量仍不确定。【原文：Foreign investors are looking with interest at longer-term Japanese bonds, while it remains uncertain when the government will adjust how much of the debt it sells, Morgan Stanley says.】

item.title: 韩国总统访问证券交易所，承诺帮助推动证券交易所发展
item.description: 韩国新当选总统李在明高调访问了韩国的主要证券交易所，这表明他明确承诺将履行其促进市场发展的承诺。【原文：South Korea’s newly elected President Lee Jae-myung made a high-profile visit to the nation’s main stock exchange, signaling a clear commitment to follow through on his pledges to boost the market.】

item.title: 拉加德警告：在贸易问题上恃强凌弱不会长期奏效
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）认为，在全球商业中充当恶霸并没有什么长远的好处。【原文：There’s no longer-term advantage to being a bully on global commerce, according to European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，泰尔支持的加密初创公司 Bullish 申请在美国上市
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，支持者包括亿万富翁彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）在内的加密资产交易所 Bullish Global 已申请在美国首次公开募股。【原文：Bullish Global, the cryptoasset exchange whose backers include billionaire Peter Thiel, has filed for a US initial public offering, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 新西兰移民人数下降可能阻碍经济复苏
item.description: 新西兰 4 月份的移民人数降至两年半以来的最低点，这增加了经济复苏速度低于预期的风险，可能会促使更多的国家降息。【原文：New Zealand immigration fell to a two-and-a-half year low in April, adding to risks of a slower-than-expected economic recovery that could prompt more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚铁矿石质量下降引发品位基准调整
item.description: 由于最大出口国澳大利亚的供应质量恶化，铁矿石行业对海运货物的关键定价基准将被降低。【原文：The iron ore industry’s key pricing benchmark for seaborne cargoes will be lowered as the quality of supplies from biggest exporter Australia worsens.】

item.title: GQG 的詹恩因数据中心困境而减少人工智能投资，支持公用事业公司
item.description: GQG Partners 新兴市场股票基金（GQG Partners Emerging Markets Equity Fund）的经理拉吉夫-詹恩（Rajiv Jain）管理着 230 亿美元的基金，由于担心数据中心需求减弱，他正在减少与人工智能相关的投资，同时继续看好公用事业。【原文：Rajiv Jain, manager of the $23 billion GQG Partners Emerging Markets Equity Fund, is trimming exposure to investments linked to artificial intelligence on concerns of waning data-center demand, while remaining bullish on utilities.】

item.title: Rapido 进军印度食品配送业务，对 Swiggy 和 Zomato 构成威胁
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 任天堂在四天内售出 350 万台 Switch 2 游戏机，创历史新高
item.description: 任天堂公司在短短四天内就售出了 350 多万台 Switch 2，创下了该公司八年来首款新游戏机的销售记录。【原文：Nintendo Co. sold 3.5 million-plus units of the Switch 2 in just four days, a record-breaking start for the company’s first new console in eight years.】

item.title: 阿波罗称贸易担忧对亚洲私人信贷有利
item.description: 据阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Global volatility from uncertain trade policies has been a positive for private credit in Asia, as regional investors look to allocate more money locally, according to Apollo Global Management Inc.】

item.title: 台湾限制拥挤金融业的敌意收购
item.description: 台湾监管机构宣布计划有效阻止岛内拥挤的金融业中的恶意收购，几个月前，该计划阻止了一项价值约 41 亿美元的交易，该交易本可创建台湾最大的金融集团。【原文：Taiwan regulators announced plans to effectively block hostile takeovers in the island’s crowded financial sector, months after preventing a roughly $4.1 billion deal that would have created Taiwan’s largest financial group.】
